name: Skies the Limit [7DLR]
description:
Mal was sent to the pit and is now tasked to fix the void, but she has more plans for herself. What's down there? Very few has managed to make it to the end, even fewer has came back in one piece. Will you make it to the 50th floor of the pit?

Skies the Limit is a roguelike game made in RPG Maker, mainly in the style of Paper Mario's Pit of 100 Trials. You must traverse through, battling monsters and finding odd treasure, all of this to prepare for the final floor: Floor 50 . 

This game was made for the 7DLR 2022 Game Jam. Resources used were anything that comes default with RPG Maker. That includes the music used, animations, tilesets, and some assortment of graphics. This project also uses plugins from Yanfly. 

PLEASE BE AWARE THIS GAME CONTAINS A LOT OF FLASHING AND STROBING LIGHTS IN THIS GAME AND THERE'S NO WAY TO TURN IT OFF.

Download the game and unzip the file. Do so by right clicking the zip file and clicking "Extract all", Then click on the program that says "Game.exe"
